metadata.title: CVE-2018-1000833 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: ZoneMinder version <= 1.32.2 contains a Other/Unknown vulnerability in User-controlled parameter that can result in Disclosure of confidential data, denial of service, SSRF, remote code execution.

criterions.comment: zoneminder package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.32.3-2build1').
